scripts.say: Our battle with the Sirens continues...
Eep! Stay away, I can't handle it when combat gets too close for comfort!
Avrora, any update on where our backup is?
They're not far! We just need to hold on a little longer!
(Update? How can they still communicate over radio in a Mirror Sea?)
(Seeing how big this iceberg is, it's going to take some time before we can link back up with Saratoga's team...)
I'll try! But I'm nearly out of– Ah! There they are!
Thank goodness, they've finally come for us.
The backup is not what I had expected.
From beyond the horizon, through the icy winds blowing across the frozen ocean, a group of girls clad in white winter uniforms appear.
Their ranks are composed of destroyers, cruisers, and battleships.
Though their silhouettes are unmistakably human, their auras are anything but; they move like a majestic wave of steel. Their presence reassures the mind.
The riggings they don give off an extraordinary air, one much different to that of Pamiat's or Avrora's.
The weight and ruggedness of their equipment seemed to channel the biting cold of the Arctic North, an otherworldly blue light occasionally seeping out from the gaps between their black iron plates.
There was something almost "primal" about their appearance...
Almost as if... they were Sirens...
What I saw was not reinforcements from the Eagle Union...
But rather the full might of the Northern Parliament which had long been locked in conflict with the Sirens.
